summary:
Ever wanted to marry an orc but didn\'t care for the ones available? An orc who shares your love of thoughtless murder? Well then try Borkul the Beauty! 

Yes, I know calling him a beauty might make him mad, but for that brief moment before he puts a pickaxe through my skull, the fire in his good eye will make it worth it!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to marry an orc but didn\'t care for the ones available? An orc who shares your love of thoughtless murder? Well then try Borkul the Beauty! 

Yes, I know calling him a beauty might make him mad, but for that brief moment before he puts a pickaxe through my skull, the fire in his good eye will make it worth it! 

What this mod does: 
Adds the option to marry Borkul. 
Adds the option to have Borkul as a follower. 
Makes Borkul essential. 
Adds an Orcish waraxe to his inventory. 
Borkul can level up with your character, up to level 80. 
Borkul will tolerate any crime. 
Speed increased to 150 so he can run faster as a follower. 

*Note: Other mods can mess with this one. Make sure to put this mod at the bottom of the load order. 

How to marry Borkul: 
1.Install the mod to the Data folder or install with NMM. 
2.Do the Cidna mine quest. 
3.Side with Madanach 
4.When quest is complete, put on your Amulet of Mara and chase him down! Bahahahaha. 
Or Meet him at Druadach Redoubt, where the group will greet you as a friend. He should be walking around the front area. 
5. Propose or ask him to follow you. 
6. Profit! 

Update:
09/15/2013 - v1.1 - Added an edit I thought was in there but wasn\'t.  Should be fixed now.
author: spacesushi
